unnormalised: Arre yaar, bank mhunnta mhojem personal loan-achem EMI ₹15,000 dor mhoineaak! Hanvem fakt Rs. 5 lakh-anchem loan ghetlam. Tem normal asa kai, bhai?
normalised: Arey yaar, bank mazyak personal loan-ak E-M-I pandra hazar rupayaa prati mahinaa bharta mhantaa! Haanv fokot panch lakh rupayaanchem karz ghetlam. Tem saralem, bhai?
text: Arre yaar, bank mhunnta mhojem personal loan-achem EMI ₹15,000 dor mhoineaak! Hanvem fakt Rs. 5 lakh-anchem loan ghetlam. Tem normal asa kai, bhai?
